name: Soundboard: The Symphony
description:
Welcome to Soundboard: The Symphony.  SBTS is a small and simple game anyone can play. If you're looking to relax, SBTS has calming sounds like the tea pouring noise. If you're looking for a laugh, SBTS has that too. SBTS even has sounds that'll make you feel...nostalgic. SBTS can be played by younger kids or an older crowd. Get your copy of SBTS today.

Ages: 3+

NOTE: Controls instructions are included with download bundle and they're also on the website.
